insert into history (id,`name`, entrytime, phone, email, sex, skill, salary, departmentname, authority, `rank`, resignation, experience ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entrytime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skill,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salary,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{departmentname,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{authority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resignation,jdbcType=DATE}, #{experience,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update history set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, entrytime = #{entrytime,jdbcType=DATE}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, skill = #{skill,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salary = #{salary,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, departmentname = #{departmentname,jdbcType=INTEGER}, authority = #{authority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `rank` = #{rank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resignation = #{resignation,jdbcType=DATE}, experience = #{experience,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, `name`, entrytime, phone, email, sex, skill, salary, departmentname, authority, `rank`, resignation, experience from history where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
